components-cards-basiccard--with-border.title: How to deploy 1C with a Microsoft SQL Server<sup>™</sup> cluster
components-cards-basiccard--with-border.text: Create a Microsoft SQL Server™ database cluster on your own or use Managed Service for SQL Server™. This database is optimal for working with 1C:Enterprise.

components-cards-basiccard--with-icon.text: Create a Microsoft SQL Server™ database cluster on your own or use Managed Service for SQL Server™. This database is optimal for working with 1C:Enterprise.

components-cards-basiccard--default.title: How to deploy 1C with a Microsoft SQL Server<sup>™</sup> cluster
components-cards-basiccard--default.text: Yandex Cloud is a public cloud platform that provides corporations, medium businesses, and individual developers with a scalable infrastructure, data storage services, and ML and development tools.
components-cards-basiccard--default.additionalInfo: Yandex Cloud was launched in 2018 and has doubled in size since then. Both in total revenue and in terms of its customer base: more than 10 thousand companies now use our services every day.
